text:
Can an #employer offer an #incentive to encourage employees to get a #COVID19 #vaccine? 
This question, like many others related to the vaccine, is at the front of many employers' minds. Address these arising issues with this list of the top #vaccineFAQs. https://t.co/u8GjGmgA6u https://t.co/3FXrFxdaUV
